CustomField.formula: IF(amc__End_Date__c >=TODAY(),amc__Allowance__c - amc__Used__c , IF(amc__Accrues__c = TRUE , IF(amc__Accrual__c > 0,IF((amc__Allowance__c * amc__Accrual__c)>(amc__Allowance__c - amc__Used__c),(amc__Allowance__c - amc__Used__c),(amc__Allowance__c * amc__Accrual__c)),(amc__Allowance__c - amc__Used__c)),0))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies how many days are remaining from this Holiday Allowance
CustomField.label: Remaining
